title: Be Curious and Embrace Your Creative Fluidity with Joonbug
description: Inspiration can truly come from anywhere, and in Joonbug’s case, this has ranged from the great Jamaican outdoors to the inside of a McDonald’s drive-thru. In this week’s episode, we sit down with Joonbug to discuss his fluid, yet intentional approach to art and creative, some of the latest tools driving his work, and how his perspective on money has shifted over the years as an artist.
dc:creator: How You Create
